note.p: Chemist. Inherited his father’s iron foundery in Blackfriars, London, and continued the business. Published on practical chemistry. Helped establish the British Home for Incurables. Fellow of the Royal Astronomical Society, 1833. FRS 1843.
Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society 50 (1890): 164–5

p.hi: Record of the Royal Society of London
